mcq.statement: Strait of Malacca separates ______ and ______, and join ______ and ______.

options.a: Brunei and Singapore, South China Sea and Gulf of Thailand
options.b: Singapore and Malaysia, Java Sea and South China Sea
options.c: Indonesia and Singapore, Andaman Sea and Gulf of Thailand
options.d: Malay and Sumatra, Andaman Sea and South China Sea
